className.transform: const cn = (await import('@/lib/utils')).cn; return cn('flex gap-2', data === 'vertical' ? 'flex-col' : 'flex-row items-center justify-between', props.className)
const cn = (await import('@/lib/utils')).cn; return cn('text-sm text-muted-foreground', props.labelClassName)
const cn = (await import('@/lib/utils')).cn; return cn('text-sm font-medium', props.valueClassName)
